mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_name AS goodsName, s.item_goods AS goodsId, gi.img_goods AS goodsImgPath, s.item_id AS itermId, s.item_price AS goodsTotalPrice, s.item_num AS goodsNum, g.goods_price AS goodsPrice FROM goods g LEFT JOIN goods_img gi ON gi.img_goods = g.goods_id INNER JOIN shopitem s ON s.item_goods = g.goods_id where s.item_user = #{userId}
